citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:00-5:30pm on 18-
OCT-21. The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, waited 30 minutes, and left a voicemail message before
departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:00-5:30pm on 18-
OCT-21.  The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, waited 30 minutes, and left a voicemail message before 
departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
